title: Griswold, LLC.
content:
From vibration control to shock and impact absorption, sealing to non-skid solutions – you can count on their seasoned engineering team for deep expertise to help you create effective approaches and meet unique functional requirements.

Griswold® enlighten-U® – Exceptional Long-Term Sealing and Cushioning Performance

Griswold’s enlighten-U® microcellular urethane has excellent compression set resistance, predictable hardness, tight thickness tolerances and superior energy absorption properties, perfect for a variety of gasketing and sealing applications in the automotive/transportation, medical, polishing, flexographic printing and electronics industries. The enlighten-U products continually evolve to meet the needs of your advancing technology. At Griswold, the engineering and production teams are flexible and nimble, often working with tight timelines to meet demanding customer requirements.

Key Benefits:
  • Breadth of hardness
  • Broad range of thicknesses
  • Energy absorption
  • Flame retardant
  • Low compression set
  • Plasticizer free

Griswold® Sponge – Problem Solving Materials for Slipping, Gripping, Sealing and Vibration Management

Griswold offers a wide range of open cell, cellular rubber products based predominantly on natural rubber, but also include offerings in neoprene, EPDM, Nitrile and SBR, as well as custom-designed compounds.

Key Benefits:
  • Anti-slip
  • Broad range of constructions
  • Broad range of thickness
  • Electrostatically dissipative
  • Flexible formats
  • Tough and durable

Griswold® FlameSafe™ – The Solution for Applications Needing UL Approval for Heat Resistance

With FlameSafe™, designers can now utilize the great properties of natural rubber, like tremendous grip and wear in friction components, with vibration and noise damping properties for applications that require UL approval, such as appliances, robotics, and enclosures.

Key Benefits:
  • UL HBF Yellow Card
  • High coefficient of friction
  • Noise and vibration damping
  • Long life
  • UL approved
description: Griswold, LLC. - Your Partner for a Wide Range of Engineered Cellular Rubber
